# About
Telegram doesn't have a built-in feature to mention all chat members ðŸ¥´. This bot solves the problem!ðŸ¥°

# Functional
1. ```/help``` - list of commands

2. ```/all``` - mention all group members

3. ```/info``` - get information about the bot

4. ```/crypto``` - get information about **Crypto** market (to USDT)

5. ```/stocks``` - get information about **Stocks** market (to USD)

6. ```/metals``` - get information about **Precious metals** market (only on Sber offices in Russia, to RUB)

7. ```/currencies``` - get information about **Currencies** market (USD, EUR and CNY to RUB)

8. ```/markets``` - get information about **Crypto**, **Stocks**, **Metals** & **Currencies** markets

# How to use
1. Add [my bot](https://t.me/all_eeee_gorka_bot) to chat, where you need to mention all members

Thats all! Now you can use commands, congratulations ðŸŽ‰
